content: Freaking LOLTitle was something about Biden shaking hands with air, lol.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: What topic are we talking about? Ah, about this topic. I got a report from a user that this topic has a low value. I agreed with that report and moved the topic to Trashcan. The topic is really about nothing. By the way, exactly your post in this thread is an offtopic that has nothing to do with the subject of the topic.Here's a link to the topic in ninjastic https://ninjastic.space/topic/5467560

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 06:54:27 PMI couldn't find it in ninja's site, it was removed so fast that ninja's site couldn't archive it.😂Try harderhttps://ninjastic.space/topic/5467560And yeah, all these should go straight to the trashcan, they are one of the reasons P&C became a cesspool in the first place.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 07:10:39 PMI was just getting warm for discussion on a few subjects, but it got deleted.Name me what the deleted topics were called? As far as I remember, this is the first topic I deleted while I was moderator of this section. So any questions about other deleted topics, that's not for me.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 07:22:41 PMQuote from: Xal0lex on October 02, 2023, 07:15:09 PMQuote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 07:10:39 PMI was just getting warm for discussion on a few subjects, but it got deleted.Name me what the deleted topics were called? As far as I remember, this is the first topic I deleted while I was moderator of this section.Well good job on your first action as a moderator, right to the point, I don't know why I am destined to argue with P&S's moderators. 😂 if you only deleted one topic, then that's it, also why are you going to other threads threatening people to delete their posts if they don't stop something? Lol, you are a moderator for God's sake, not a morality police.You should either post a sticky topic or edit the existing one to set your rules first, then anyone reading it would know not to post there at all.Since when do moderators need to make their own rules to remove offtopic from profile topics?  Offtopic is forbidden by the forum rules (point 2). And the morality police had absolutely nothing to do with it, they were breaking the forum rules.Further, I did not threaten anyone, but warned these users to stop off-topic, going to personalities with mutual insults. Insults are not prohibited by the forum rules if they are present in thematic posts. But if there is just mutual insults that have nothing to do with the topic, then such posts should be deleted.Have you read these posts? No? Then I will show you some of them.Quote from: https://ninjastic.space/post/62935384BADecker-Fuck you.Quote from: https://ninjastic.space/post/62935352BADecker-Go take a shit down your ugly mother's throat. Hitler loves you. Satan loves you. You are a piece of shit. And when you go to Hell, you will revert back into an infant where the demons will do the most heinous things to you that you can or can't imagine? Have you heard of the brazen bull? That is where when you go to Hell, you in your infantile state will be shoved inside a bronze bull and a fire will be lit below the bull. Your screams and cries will be converted into bull noises, and your punishment will be completely just. You will deserve your punishment because you have been completely and utterly consumed by evil. Oh. And before you pass away, there will be another pandemic caused by your species' unwillingness to implement the bio-safety protocol that I have been advocating for in the past but have been discouraged from supporting because fuck humanity.Quote from: https://ninjastic.space/post/62933000All of you fuckers are fucking stupid and worthless pieces of shit who deserve to suffer and die in the next pandemic. Oh. And the next pandemic will come because I have decided to no longer make sure that biological laboratories are actually safe. Nobody else has enough understanding of anything to realize that we need this. You all therefore need me. You have not been grateful that I have advocated for this so far, so I have decided to stop advocating for this. I guess this means that we will certainly have another pandemic. And after you die in the next pandemic, you will go to Hell, and in Hell, you will revert back into infants and after you become infants, the demons will do the most heinous horrible things to you.-Fuck you you fucking fucker. Go fuck your dead mother at the cemetary.-Joseph Van Name Ph.D.I think that's enough.Quote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 07:22:41 PM...don't worry too much.Oh, I'm not worried

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 07:22:41 PMalso why are you going to other threads threatening people to delete their posts if they don't stop something? Lol, you are a moderator for God's sake, not a morality police.That is literally what a moderator does. You should let Xaolex do their job without this much drama so early on. You're complaining about a thread being deleted and still complaining about the mod using a different approach to get users to stop going off topic and explaining why some earlier posts will be deleted.Quote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 07:22:41 PMmaybe my last post was off topic to you, but it's not off topic to the previous member, and in general is 100% on topic.  It's about politics after all,The are the mod, and interprete cases based on their understanding of the rules. The fact that you disagree with that does not make them wrong.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: I, within the rubbish board that the P&S tends to be, with some exceptions, don't think it's bad that this thread has been trashed. I guess it's about time someone started cleaning up the board, because it's one thing to have respect for each other's political opinions and another to let it become a lowkey off-topic board.Quote from: JollyGood on October 03, 2023, 02:25:45 AM<...>Quote from: JollyGood on October 03, 2023, 02:25:45 AMQuote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 07:10:39 PMI was just getting warm for discussion on a few subjects, but it got deleted.Name me what the deleted topics were called? It looks confusing as it wasn't you who said the last sentence, it was Xal0lex.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Flying Hellfish was a buddy of mine (until he vanished), & we spoke about his moderation a good deal. Yes, he’s a liberal, but he didn’t delete posts because he didn’t agree with the politics (conservative stuff), he did because of stuff like “low value” of kinda “off topic”.  He would tell me how stressful it was dealing with people making false accusations about being biased.  I knew him well enough to know he legitimately was just trying to do what he felt Theymos would want out of a mod/what was best. People are too quick cry wolf too. Give the new mod some time, there’s a learning curve. And have some compassion, imagine having to read BADeckers posts daily.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Sorry to intrude, watching from ninjastic.space the post has nothing to show or represent to the general forum as I may see it over thereQuote from: digaran on October 02, 2023, 06:54:27 PMI mean, this new moderator is biasedThe function of moderator is to correct and fix things that are not meant to be in a place were it shouldn't be.. So saying he biased is something not too cool with me, though I know not everyone is correct but at this post I don't see any efforts on it to be left there as something worth discussing on, It doesn't give any direction rather it would creates a spamming replies or a kind of repetition of comments.
